business.headline: Sensex closes 645 points lower, Nifty below 24,700; IndusInd Bank gains 2%The S&P BSE Sensex lost 644.64 points to end at 80,951.99, while the NSE Nifty50 was down by 203.75 points to close at 24,609.70.

Borana Weaves IPO booked over 100 times: Check latest subscription, GMPAllotment for the Borana Weaves IPO is expected to be finalised on Friday, May 23, 2025. The company is likely to list its shares on the stock exchanges on Tuesday, May 27, 2025.
Reliance to start solar module factory this year: ReportThis year, Reliance Industries will launch its solar module factory, aiming to meet India's clean energy goals by producing 20 GW annually.

World's happiest and unhappiest careers revealed. Is your job among them?Researchers at the University of Tartu in Estonia looked at 263 different jobs and asked over 59,000 people about their work and life satisfaction. They also used health data from the Estonian Biobank to get a better picture of what really makes people happy in their jobs.

Covid cases surge in India: Will it trigger a stock market crash?Stock market today: The S&P BSE Sensex had dropped by over 900 points to 80,681.76, while the NSE Nifty50 was down 266 points at 24,547.45 as of 12:45 pm. The fall in the market comes after days of strong performance.

Walmart to cut 1,500 jobs in restructuring move: ReportThe job cuts will affect several areas, including Walmart's global tech team, the e-commerce section in US stores, and its advertising arm, Walmart Connect.

EPFO adds 14.58 lakh members in March. Women and youth lead the wayMost of the new members who joined EPFO for the first time in March were youngsters. Around 4.45 lakh people in the 18–25 age group signed up in March, making up nearly 59% of all new subscribers. Many in this age group are first-time jobseekers.

Tata Teleservices shares jumps 11% today. What's driving the rally?The trigger behind the rally appears to be growing speculation around a potential capital infusion by Tata Sons Ltd into its struggling telecom subsidiary, Tata Teleservices Ltd (TTSL).

ABFRL demerger: Brokerages assign fair value to new fashion twins. Details hereBrokerages have begun breaking down the newly split entities, laying out distinct growth paths and fair value estimates for both ABFRL and ABLBL.

All ITR forms are out, but you still can't file. What's causing the delay?While all seven ITR forms (ITR-1 to ITR-7) and even the updated ITR-U form are ready, the filing process can't begin until the government activates the utility software. These utilities are essential tools that help taxpayers fill in, check, and submit their returns online or offline.

ABFRL stock drops 66% post demerger. What investors should know The sharp decline from Wednesday's close of Rs 268.95 reflects the market's adjustment for the value of the demerged entity, not a deterioration in Aditya Birla Fashion and Retail Ltd's fundamentals.

Who is Vaibhav Taneja? Tesla CFO who made more than Pichai and NadellaWhile Sundar Pichai took home $10.73 million and Satya Nadella received $79.1 million in 2024, Taneja's total earnings far exceeded both.

entertainment.headline: Kamal Haasan on dealing with release day pressure: With age, we learn to take blameActor Kamal Haasan, during the promotions of his upcoming film Thug Life, reflected on handling release-day pressure and the importance of staying humble and grounded.

Rajkummar Rao joins filmmaker Soojit Sircar in a two-hero comedy film: ReportRajkummar Rao has reportedly teamed up with director Shoojit Sircar for an upcoming two-hero satirical comedy. Filming is set to begin in late 2025, with the search for the second lead currently underway.

Prateik Smita Patil on dropping his surname: I didn't want to belong to themActor Prateik Smita Patil recently opened up about the custody battle between his late mother's family and father Raj Babbar. He also reflected on how he initially felt bitter about his parents.

Jewellery brand ropes in Shah Rukh Khan to target Gen Z, millennialsActor Shah Rukh Khan has been roped in by lifestyle jewellery brand Candere as its ambassador. Shah Rukh expressed his admiration for jewellery as symbolic of love, memories and identity.

Kajol seeks blessings at Kolkata's Dakshineswar Kali temple ahead of her film MaaAfter seeking blessings at the Dakshineswar Kali Temple in Kolkata, Kajol called her role in 'Maa' her strongest ever. Directed by Vishal Furia, the film will follow her powerful journey as a mother fiercely protecting her daughter.

Exclusive: Music artist KSHMR explains how he makes money from royalty-free musicAmerican musician KSHMR explains how he earns from royalty-free music samples used globally, including by popular K-pop groups. He also shared how he incorporates his Indian roots into his music.

Sunny Deol to make his OTT debut with director Sidharth P Malhotra: ReportSunny Deol is set to make his Netflix debut with an action thriller directed by Siddharth P Malhotra, adapted from the 2007 film 'Death Sentence'. The project, written by Suparn Verma, begins filming in July 2025 and marks a major addition to Deol's packed slate of upcoming releases.

Silambarasan on playing a feminine role in STR 50: Took notes from Kamal HaasanActor Silambarasan confirms playing a character with feminine traits in his upcoming film, STR 50. He revealed that he discussed the role with Kamal Haasan to understand the nuances better.

Suniel Shetty reacts to backlash over normal delivery remark: Comment was twistedSuniel Shetty addressed backlash over his comments on daughter Athiya's natural delivery, clarifying his remarks were taken out of context. He issued a sincere apology to women, emphasising respect for all birthing choices.

Pankaj Tripathi debunks rumours of replacing Paresh Rawal in Hera Pheri 3Actor Pankaj Tripathi recently reacted to the ongoing fans' appeal about replacing Paresh Rawal in 'Hera Pheri 3.' The actor reasoned why he was not the right choice to play Baburao Ganpatrao Apte.

Explained: Tamannaah's Mysore Sandal deal and non-Kannadiga ambassador backlashActor Tamannaah was signed on as the brand ambassador of Mysore Sandal Soap, which did not go down well with a section of people on the Internet. Many questioned the Karnataka government's decision to appoint a Bollywood actor for the brand over Kannada actors.

My goddess: Janhvi Kapoor's wet saree look wins boyfriend Shikhar's heartActor Janhvi Kapoor's boyfriend, Shikhar Pahariya, was all smitten by her looks in a white outfit at Cannes. His reply under the actor's pictures is sure to melt your heart.

Salman Khan invited me, know him for 6 months: Woman who trespassed into his homeOn the early morning of May 21, 36-year-old Isha Chabria trespassed into Galaxy Apartments in Mumbai, where actor Salman Khan lives with his family. She has now claimed that she has known the superstar for six months and was invited into his home.

Salman Khan to not replace Big B as KBC 17 host: SourceSalman Khan will not replace Amitabh Bachchan as 'Kaun Banega Crorepati 17' host. A source close to the development told India Today that such reports are not true.

Deepika Padukone, Mrunal Thakur and Janhvi Kapoor in Allu Arjun's AA22: ReportAllu Arjun and Atlee's upcoming futuristic action entertainer might feature Deepika Padukone, Mrunal Thakur, and Janhvi Kapoor as the female leads. The film was announced earlier this year.

Ram Charan's Peddi shoot gains momentum, makers erect massive village set in HydMakers of Telugu actor Ram Charan's upcoming film, 'Peddi', have erected a massive village set in Hyderabad where a lengthy and crucial shoot schedule is currently underway. The 'RRR' actor shared pictures from the film set.

Actor Jeremy Renner on 'exhilarating' near-death moment: Didn't want to come backActor Jeremy Renner recently said that he didn't want to come back from the near-death moment following the snowplough accident. He called the experience 'exhilarating' and 'magical'.

Simran addresses fellow actor's 'aunty roles' jab: Was hurt, she said I'm sorryTamil actor Simran's recent speech at the JFW Movie Awards went viral on social media as she called out a fellow actor's rude comments. Now, following the success of her latest film 'Tourist Family', Simran has addressed the issue and revealed that the message reached the person it was intended for.
Actor Shilpa Shirodkar recovers from Covid-19, shares health update'Bigg Boss 18' fame Shilpa Shirodkar has recovered from Covid-19. The actor thanked fans for their support in a social media post.

general news.headline: On Turkey, India highlights need for 'sensitivities to each other's concerns'Referring to the outrage against Turkey over its support for Pakistan post the Pahalgam attack, EAM spokesperson Randhir Jaiswal said that both nations should have a sensitive approach towards matters concerning each other.

In Hindus, there's Moksh: Supreme Court on 'waqf is charity to God' argumentThe development came a day after the Centre told the court that waqf is nothing but charity and is not an essential part of Islam.

No bloody corridor: Bangladesh Army chief's warning makes Yunus govt blinkThe Muhammad Yunus-led interim government has blinked on the controversial Rakhine corridor plan after Bangladesh Army chief Waker-Uz-Zaman issued a stern warning, referring to it as the "bloody corridor". Yunus is believed to have agreed to the Rakhine corridor, seen as a threat to Bangladesh's sovereignty, to cling on to power with the help of the US.

Who's Jason Miller, India's lobbyist in DC, and can he turn the tide?The Indian government has hired Jason Miller, a senior adviser to US President Donald Trump, as its lobbyist in Washington, DC, amid post-Operation Sindoor diplomacy. Miller will be providing "strategic counsel, tactical planning", traditional lobbying services, and perception management. Here's more about the long-time Trump aide.

Indian-origin techie gatecrashes Microsoft event over Gaza, yet againIndian-origin techie Vaniya Agarwal, who disrupted a major Microsoft event in April and was subsequently fired, once again interrupted the tech giant's Build 2025 conference in Seattle, Washington. She alleged that Microsoft was complicit in Israel's military campaign in Gaza. Agarwal, along with another former employee, confronted Neta Haiby, the company's Head of AI Security, over Microsoft's agreements with Israel.

Indore rifle shooting coach arrested for molesting girl under guise of practiceIndore Police arrested shooting coach Mohsin Khan for allegedly molesting girl trainees at a local academy under the guise of practice. The accused also reportedly recorded videos and trapped multiple women.

Pak High Commission staffer's close associate among two 'spies' arrested in UPThe two people arrested, identified as Mohammad Haroon and Tufail, are accused of leaking important and sensitive information about India's internal security.

Jai MATA Di: How Trump is evolving as world's greatest brokerDonald Trump's recent trip to the Middle East has been quite eventful. He announced a whopping $200 billion in deals and received a $400 million luxury jet as a gift from Qatar. No wonder the US President is evolving as the world's greatest broker.

A neck for a neck? Bangladesh's two Chicken Necks that Himanta Sarma has raked upHimanta Sarma put Bangladesh on notice amid Dhaka's growing interest in New Delhi's strategically crucial Chicken's Neck, also known as the Siliguri Corridor.

Salman Khan invited me, know him for 6 months: Woman who trespassed into his homeOn the early morning of May 21, 36-year-old Isha Chabria trespassed into Galaxy Apartments in Mumbai, where actor Salman Khan lives with his family. She has now claimed that she has known the superstar for six months and was invited into his home.

Enjoying a junket: Subramanian Swamy's quip as MPs embark on global outreachThe seven delegations, comprising 59 leaders across party lines, will travel to around 32 nations to brief foreign governments on how India has been a victim of terror emanating from Pakistan.

Explained: Tamannaah's Mysore Sandal deal and non-Kannadiga ambassador backlashActor Tamannaah was signed on as the brand ambassador of Mysore Sandal Soap, which did not go down well with a section of people on the Internet. Many questioned the Karnataka government's decision to appoint a Bollywood actor for the brand over Kannada actors.

Pak-linked firm behind 'spy' YouTuber's trips partnered with Azerbaijan 2 days agoYouTuber Jyoti Malhotra, arrested for alleged spying for Pakistan, had trips sponsored by Wego, a UAE firm operating in Pakistan, which recently partnered with pro-Pakistan ally Azerbaijan.

Let's not pretend Pak not involved: Jaishankar on terrorists operating in nationJaishankar said India wanted a "definitive end" to terrorism while underlining that India's military action against Pakistan, following the Pahalgam attack, was only paused for now.

Why Trump's new tax will have Indian professionals in US worriedThe US has proposed a 5% tax on remittances sent to foreign countries by non-citizens. This will be a cause of concern for many Indian professionals working in the US on H-1B and H-2A visas, and even green card holders. But MAGA is asking for higher remittance taxes to make foreign professionals self-deport.
Sarojini Nagar Market is NOT closed. Viral JCB videos explainedContrary to what several viral videos and news reports suggest, Sarojini Nagar Market has not been demolished.

Bengaluru SBI official's apology in Kannada after 'This is India' viral videoA video of an SBI official in Bengaluru apologising in Kannada has surfaced online, a day after she refused to speak the language during an altercation with a customer. Her 'I will never speak Kannada' viral video triggered public outrage and political backlash.
Elon Musk reacts to video of Tesla owner making espresso while car drives itselfWith music playing and his espresso brewing, the man signed off with a cheerful, "Thank you, Elon. Thank you, Tesla."

Jawan killed, 2 terrorists eliminated in ongoing operation in J&K's KishtwarThe encounter broke out at around 7 am after the troops of two Para SF, Army's 11RR, 7th Assam rifles and SOG Kishtwar launched a search operation in Singhpora Chatroo.
PM Modi, Sindoor, and a hint of drama. India's Cannes takeover isn't subtleThis year, the Cannes Film Festival wasn't just about movies and red carpet glamour—it had its share of political drama too.

CBI files chargesheet against ex-J&K Governor Satya Pal Malik in corruption caseThe case pertains to suspected irregularities in the tendering process for the Kiru Hydroelectric Power Project in Kishtwar.

US was in United States: S Jaishankar on Trump's credit claim on India-Pak truceExternal Affairs Minister S Jaishankar stated that several countries reached out to India during the four-day conflict. He revealed that the Narendra Modi government had conveyed to all nations, including the US, that Pakistan would need to approach India directly if it sought a ceasefire.

Wedding gift: DK Shivakumar confirms Ranya Rao's link to minister's trustKarnataka Deputy Chief Minister DK Shivakumar has followed in Chief Minister Siddaramaiah's steps and come out in support of Home Minister G Parameshwara. The support comes amidst the second day of ED raids on institutions linked to Parameshwara.

sports.headline: Pakistan's Arshad Nadeem responds to Neeraj Chopra's 'not close friends' commentPakistan's Arshad Nadeem was asked for his thoughts on Neeraj Chopra's recent comments about their camaraderie. The Olympic champion also reiterated that his ultimate goal is to breach the 100-metre mark in men's javelin.

Luka Modric to end trophy-laden Real Madrid career, leave after Club World CupLuka Modric announced on Thursday that he will leave Real Madrid after the Club World Cup. The Croatian midfielder, the club's most successful player and the 2018 Ballon d'Or winner, is preparing to end his trophy-laden stint in Spain.

Watch: Arshad Khan slips on his bowling mark, takes scary fall twiceGujarat Titans fast bowler Arshad Khan slipped on his bowling mark twice in his first over against Lucknow Super Giants. The GT dugout looked concerned with the way that Arshad fell.

Ashish Nehra has a clear vision: Shubman Gill credits coach for GT's successGujarat Titans captain Shubman Gill on Thursday attributed the team's strong performance in the ongoing IPL to head coach Ashish Nehra's "excellent communication" with the players.

Watch: Suryakumar fulfils wife's IPL 2025 wish, shares heartwarming videoIPL 2025, MI vs DC: Suryakumar Yadav kept his promise to his wife by winning the Player of the Match award in Mumbai Indians' crucial victory over Delhi Capitals on Wednesday in Mumbai. With the win, MI secured their place in the play-offs.

French Open draw: Djokovic, Sinner in same half, Swiatek lands in Sabalenka's halfWorld No. 1 Jannik Sinner will kick off his French Open 2025 campaign against home favourite Arthur Rinderknech. Meanwhile, defending champion Iga Swiatek faces a daunting road to the title after landing in the same half as current World No. 1 Aryna Sabalenka.

Rishabh Pant slams post claiming his release from LSG before IPL 2026LSG skipper Rishabh Pant has slammed a post by a user claiming that he will be released by the Lucknow franchise ahead of the IPL 2026 season. Pant has endured a horrid season with Lucknow this year.

DC co-owner apologises to fans after IPL 2025 exit, vows deep introspectionDelhi Capitals co-owner Parth Jindal has said that the team will do a deep introspection after their IPL 2025 campaign came to an end on May 21. DC lost to MI as their form slipped away after a brilliant start.

IPL's latest sensation Vaibhav Suryavanshi gets hero's welcome in his villageRajasthan Royals' teenage sensation Vaibhav Suryavanshi returned to a hero's welcome in his ancestral village of Tajpur, in Bihar's Samastipur district.

Kidambi Srikanth continues resurgent run in Malaysia Masters, reaches quartersMalaysia Masters 2025: Kidambi Srikanth, ranked 65, reached the quarterfinals of a Super 500 tournament or above for the first time since October 2023.

Rishabh Pant slams post claiming his release from LSG before IPL 2026LSG skipper Rishabh Pant has slammed a post by a user claiming that he will be released by the Lucknow franchise ahead of the IPL 2026 season. Pant has endured a horrid season with Lucknow this year.

DC co-owner apologises to fans after IPL 2025 exit, vows deep introspectionDelhi Capitals co-owner Parth Jindal has said that the team will do a deep introspection after their IPL 2025 campaign came to an end on May 21. DC lost to MI as their form slipped away after a brilliant start.

IPL's latest sensation Vaibhav Suryavanshi gets hero's welcome in his villageRajasthan Royals' teenage sensation Vaibhav Suryavanshi returned to a hero's welcome in his ancestral village of Tajpur, in Bihar's Samastipur district.

Kidambi Srikanth continues resurgent run in Malaysia Masters, reaches quartersMalaysia Masters 2025: Kidambi Srikanth, ranked 65, reached the quarterfinals of a Super 500 tournament or above for the first time since October 2023.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
